title: Sunteck Realty share price rises 8% as Q2FY25 pre-sales increase 33% to  ₹524 crore, collections rise 25%
description: Stock Market Today: Sunteck Realty share price gained more than 8% in morning trades on Tuesday. The company reported strong business updates wherein its July-September 2024 pre-sales increased by 33% to  ₹524 crore while collections rose 25%.
content: Stock Market Today: Sunteck Realty share price gained more than 8% in morning trade on Tuesday, October 15 after the company reported a strong business update for the July-September quarter.In July-September 2024, pre-sales increased by 33% year-on-year (YoY) to  ₹524 crore while collections rose 25% YoY.Sunteck Realty share price opened at  ₹565.40 on the BSE on Tuesday, 2% higher than the previous close of  ₹554.10. It gained further to the intraday high of  ₹602.35, marking gains of more than 8%.Suntech Realty share has seen good gains of more than 37% in the last six months.Sunteck Realty at the end of the July-September quarter (Q2 FY25) reported pre-sales of  ₹524 crore, an increase of 32.7% YoY compared to  ₹395 crore in the year-ago quarter. On a sequential basis, Sunteck Realty pre-sales increased 4.5% over  ₹502 crore in the previous quarter.During the first half or H1 FY25 (April-September 2024), pre-sales for Sunteck Realty registered a growth of 31.2% YoY to  ₹1,026 crore against  ₹782 crore in H1 FY24.Sunteck Realty said that it recorded collections of  ₹267 crore in Q2 FY25, an increase of 24.8% on a YoY basis compared to  ₹214 crore in the year-ago quarter. On a sequential basis, Sunteck Realty collections were slightly lower than  ₹324 crore in the April-June 2024 quarter.For the first half of H1 FY25, Sunteck Realty's collections stood at  ₹609 crore, marking a growth of 21.3% on a YoY basis compared to  ₹502 crore seen in H1FY24.
